periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 4pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 41. West wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 1am and 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. East northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. North wind 5 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 42. East northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

periods.name: Thursday

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. South wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Friday

periods.name: Saturday
